mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.gender AS "gender", a.headimgurl AS "headimgurl", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.work_year AS "workYear", a.card_type AS "cardType", a.idnumber AS "idnumber", a.location AS "location", a.email AS "email", a.salary AS "salary", a.current_situation AS "currentSituation", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.hukou AS "hukou", a.resumekey AS "resumekey", a.stature AS "stature", a.marrige AS "marrige", a.qq_talk AS "qqTalk", a.zip_code AS "zipCode", a.ali_talk AS "aliTalk", a.home_page AS "homePage", a.address AS "address", a.student_group AS "studentGroup", a.status AS "status", a.channel AS "channel", a.open_id AS "openId"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM resume a
a.status='0'
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resume( id, name, gender, headimgurl, birthday, work_year, card_type, idnumber, location, email, salary, current_situation, mobile, hukou, resumekey, stature, marrige, qq_talk, zip_code, ali_talk, home_page, address, student_group, status, channel, open_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{headimgurl}, #{birthday}, #{workYear}, #{cardType}, #{idnumber}, #{location}, #{email}, #{salary}, #{currentSituation}, #{mobile}, #{hukou}, #{resumekey}, #{stature}, #{marrige}, #{qqTalk}, #{zipCode}, #{aliTalk}, #{homePage}, #{address}, #{studentGroup}, #{status}, #{channel}, #{openId} )
